text: Neil Funk (born December 29, 1946) is the current television announcer for the NBA's Chicago Bulls alongside Stacey King. Funk was born in New York. He studied at Syracuse University. Funk was raised in Indianapolis, Indiana. He got his first job in Danville, Illinois.Voices of Reason. bulls.com He is currently married to Renee Funk and they have one child, William Funk. He now lives in Chicago, Illinois. ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile at bulls.com Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from New York (state) Category:Sportspeople from Chicago Category:National Basketball Association broadcasters
title: Neil Funk
